Webclient and Desktop client (jarred)[/b] Korasi D Claws Ags All Chaotics [b]Good Switching Torva, Pernix, Virtus Pvp armours[/b] Pest Control Castle Wars Duel Arena [b]Loyalty Titles (achieved through pking)[/b] [b]Pk Points and Shop[/b] All GWD Bosses Nex Jad KQ[/center] [center][b]Quick Prayers Curses Max Cape, Comp Cape, Veteran Cape, and all Milestone Capes[/b][/center] [IMG]http://i999.photobucket.com/albums/af113/krawft/PKPshop.png[/img] [IMG]http://i999.photobucket.com/albums/af113/krawft/PKPshop2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i999.photobucket.com/albums/af113/krawft/TDs.png[/img] [IMG]http://i999.photobucket.com/albums/af113/krawft/DKs.png[/img] [IMG]http://i999.photobucket.com/albums/af113/krawft/Corp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i999.photobucket.com/albums/af113/krawft/nomad.png[/img] [IMG]http://i999.photobucket.com/albums/af113/krawft/Darkbeasts.png[/img] [center]--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/center] [center][size=18pt]Come and Join us![/size][/center] [center][url=http://simplicity.co.cc/index.php[/url]HomePage[/center] [center][b]Register[/b] [url=http://simplicity.co.cc/index.php?board=39.0[/url]Here[/center]

item.title: Simplicity 24/7 Dedicated
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“krawft, post:8, topic:451791”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=554680.msg4062497#msg4062497 date=1343535095]

This looks too much the same as everything else. Good luck I guess

Doesn’t everything these days ^^
I’ll work on it, you’re right. This isn’t ready for release until we have more unique additions to our server.

No, not everything looks the same these days.
[/quote]
When you say that not all servers look the same these days, do you mean that some servers have unique customs and such?
I myself have only noticed a ton of leeched servers these days. At least on this thread…
A bunch of 700+ that have all been leeched and name changed, that’s about it. I assume you would agree with that statement right?[/quote]

What you’ve said is correct. However, I can name multiple Developers who’re doing things with R.S.P.S. that hasn’t been done yet. I can promise that their work will indeed be unique, and will look nothing like the terrible atrocities in the Server Advertisement sections of communities.

Read full topic

This looks too much the same as everything else. Good luck I guess

Doesn’t everything these days ^^
I’ll work on it, you’re right. This isn’t ready for release until we have more unique additions to our server.
[/quote]

No, not everything looks the same these days.[/quote]
When you say that not all servers look the same these days, do you mean that some servers have unique customs and such?
I myself have only noticed a ton of leeched servers these days. At least on this thread…
A bunch of 700+ that have all been leeched and name changed, that’s about it. I assume you would agree with that statement right?

Read full topic
